armyRules.name: Oath of Moment
armyRules.description:
If your Army Faction is ADEPTUS ASTARTES, at the start of your Command phase, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Until the start of your next Command phase, that enemy unit is your Oath of Moment target. Each time a model with this ability makes an attack that targets your Oath of Moment target:
• You can re-roll the Hit roll.
• If you are using a Codex: Space Marines Detachment and your army does not include one or more units with the BLACK TEMPLARS, BLOOD ANGELS, DARK ANGELS, DEATHWATCH or SPACE WOLVES keywords, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.
armyRules.flavorText: In battle, Space Marines swear mighty oaths to destroy the enemies of the Emperor and uphold the honour of their Chapter, and such vows are sacrosanct. When the Angels of Death strike, they do so with the precision of a surgeon and the force of a thunderbolt. Experience and strategic expertise help them to read the shifting shape of the battle with post-human speed and clarity, directing their wrath towards one priority target after another. Command assets are annihilated, leaving the enemy reeling leaderless. Heavy armour, potent artillery and the vaunted elites of the foe’s forces are laid waste with horrifying speed, until the Emperor’s Angels of Death stand victorious over a field of smouldering wreckage and bolt-riddled corpses, and honour is finally satisfied.

detachments.name: Saga of the Hunter
detachments.abilityDescription:
Each time a model in a SPACE WOLVES unit from your army makes a melee attack that targets an enemy unit, if that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more other ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army, or if the attacking unit contains more models than that enemy unit:
• Add 1 to the Hit roll.
• If your Saga is completed (see below), add 1 to the Wound roll as well.
Saga of the Hunter
At the start of the first battle round, your Quarry tally is 0. Each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army fights, after all of those attacks have been resolved, add 1 to your Quarry tally for each enemy unit destroyed by those attacks.
Once your Quarry tally is equal to or greater than the number shown in the table below (depending on the battle size), your Saga is completed.
BATTLE SIZEQUARRY TALLYIncursion2Strike Force3Onslaught4
detachments.abilityFlavorText: At their Wolf Lord’s command, the Space Wolves advance upon their prey with lupine hunger, singling out the weak and overwhelming the strong with concentrated force and furious aggression.

stratagems.name: HUNTERS’ TRAIL
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". When doing so, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

stratagems.name: TERRITORIAL ADVANTAGE
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit is destroyed by an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.name: OVERWHELMING ONSLAUGHT
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: Two ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or one SPACE WOLVES BEASTS unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: CHOSEN PREY
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SPACE WOLVES unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That SPACE WOLVES unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: BOUNDING ADVANCE
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or SPACE WOLVES BEASTS unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

stratagems.name: MARKED FOR DESTRUCTION
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: Two ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army (excluding BEASTS) that have not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to both of your units. Until the end of the phase, models in your units can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target) and each time a model in one of your units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

enhancements.name: Swift Hunter
enhancements.description: SPACE WOLVES model only. Models in the bearer’s unit have the Scouts 7" ability.
enhancements.flavorText: A seasoned hunter, this warrior knows well that speed and decisiveness can turn the tide of any battle.

enhancements.name: Fenrisian Grit
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.
enhancements.flavorText: All Fenrisians possess a formidable constitution, yet this warrior demonstrates legendary resolve, shrugging off wounds that would fell lesser men.

enhancements.name: Wolf Master
enhancements.description: SPACE WOLVES model only. In your Command phase, select one friendly SPACE WOLVES unit within 9" of the bearer. Until the start of your next Command phase, teeth and claws and Tyrnak and Fenrir weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
enhancements.flavorText: This warrior possesses an affinity with Fenrisian beasts and can inspire a frothing rage in their lupine companions with but a single barked command.

enhancements.name: Feral Rage
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer. Each time the bearer ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, add an additional 1 to the Attacks characteristic of those weapons.
enhancements.flavorText: There is no substitute for raw aggression. This warrior fights with the berserk rage of a thunderwolf, tearing apart their foes with violent fury.

detachments.name: Saga of the Bold
detachments.abilityDescription:
Each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army is selected to shoot or fight, apply one of the following when resolving those attacks:
• If your Saga is completed (see below), you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll and one Damage roll.
• Otherwise, if that unit is a SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one Damage roll.
Saga of the Bold
Each time a SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army does one of the following, that unit achieves that Boast. Once three or more different Boasts have been achieved by units from your army, your Saga is completed.
• Your Hide as a Trophy: That unit destroys your Oath of Moment target.
• Slay Them All: That unit destroys your Oath of Moment target, and that is the second Oath of Moment target destroyed by that unit in this battle.
• Overrun Their Position: At the end of either player’s turn, that unit is wholly within your opponent’s deployment zone.
• Hold the Line: From the second battle round onwards, at the end of your Command phase, that unit is within range of an objective marker you control that is not within your deployment zone.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: Every Space Wolves warrior seeks to forge a saga worthy of retelling.

stratagems.name: INSPIRING PRESENCE
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

stratagems.name: CHAMPION’S GUIDANCE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: BIRTH OF A SAGA
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One Wolf Guard Headtaker or Wolf Guard Terminator Pack Leader model from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, your model has the CHARACTER keyword.Designer’s Note: While in effect, your model’s unit is therefore a CHARACTER unit, meaning it can interact with the Heroes All rule, in addition to other rules that interact with CHARACTER units.

stratagems.name: ALPHA STRIKE
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: HEROIC RESOLVE
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: COUNTERCHARGE
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

enhancements.name: Braggart’s Steel
enhancements.description: SPACE WOLVES model only. Add 2 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer. If the bearer’s unit has achieved one or more Boasts, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of those weapons as well.
enhancements.flavorText: This weapon has graced the hand of many a champion and inspires in its bearers a brazen self-confidence.

enhancements.name: Skjald
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Each time a SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army achieves a Boast, if the bearer is on the battlefield, you gain 1CP.
enhancements.flavorText: This warrior is well-versed in the Chapters saga, drawing inspiration and invaluable teachings from their retelling.

enhancements.name: Hordeslayer
enhancements.description: SPACE WOLVES model only. At the start of the Fight phase, if there are more enemy models than friendly models wholly within 6" of the bearer, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer. If the bearer’s unit has achieved one or more Boasts, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic instead.
enhancements.flavorText: Seeking to take a terrible tally of lives, this warrior hurls himself into the heart of the fight, heedless of the numbers arrayed against him.

enhancements.name: Thunderwolf’s Fortitude
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The first time the bearer is destroyed, remove it from play, then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, with 3 wounds remaining.
enhancements.flavorText: Possessed of indomitable fortitude, this champion of Fenris refuses the call of Morkai, fighting beyond the limits of even a Space Marine’s endurance.

detachments.name: Saga of the Beastslayer
detachments.abilityDescription:
Each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES model from your army makes an attack, if that attack targets a CHARACTER, MONSTER or VEHICLE unit or if your Saga is completed (see below), that attack has the [lethal hits] ability.
Saga of the Beastslayer
At the start of the first battle round, your Beastslayer tally is 0, and you determine your Beastslayer target by halving the number of units from your opponent’s army (including those embarked within TRANSPORTS) that have one or more of the following keywords (rounding up): CHARACTER, MONSTER, VEHICLE.
Each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army shoots or fights, after all of those attacks have been resolved, add 1 to your Beastslayer tally for each enemy unit with one or more of the following keywords destroyed by those attacks: CHARACTER, MONSTER, VEHICLE.
Once your Beastslayer tally is equal to or greater than your Beastslayer target, your Saga is completed.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: Some Space Wolves seek only to bring down the most monstrous and deadly foes. With hunting packs of Fenrisian wolves, Thunderwolf Cavalry and rampaging bands of Wulfen, they seek to hunt down and slay mighty champions, towering monstrosities and rumbling war machines, demoralising the foe and earning glorious victories.

stratagems.name: UNBRIDLED FEROCITY
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: SHOCK CAVALRY
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

stratagems.name: PINNING FIRE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, after your unit has shot, select one enemy CHARACTER, MONSTER, or VEHICLE unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, that unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.

stratagems.name: THUNDEROUS PURSUIT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit has the SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY keywords, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

stratagems.name: IMPETUOSITY
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One WULFEN INFANTRY or BLOOD CLAWS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, after that enemy unit has shot, if one or more models in your unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit can make an Impetuous move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

stratagems.name: COORDINATED STRIKE
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Wolf-touched
enhancements.description: SPACE WOLVES model only. Add 2" to the Move characteristic of the bearer. In the Declare Battle Formations step, the bearer can be attached to a WULFEN INFANTRY unit.
enhancements.flavorText: Whilst the Canis Helix has yet to overcome this champion fully, it is stirred to life by the thrill of battle and the scent of blood.

enhancements.name: Hunter’s Guile
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. After both players have deployed their armies, select up to three THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY, WULFEN and/or BLOOD CLAWS units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves if you wish, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.
enhancements.flavorText: This warrior embodies the cunning of the wolf, utilising deception and misdirection to confound his foes.

enhancements.name: Elder’s Guidance
enhancements.description: SPACE WOLVES model only. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, if the bearer is leading a BLOOD CLAWS unit, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1.
enhancements.flavorText: Wily and long of fang, this warrior brings centuries of battlefield experience to the fight, lending focus to the reckless fury of his youthful battle-brothers.

enhancements.name: Helm of the Beastslayer
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Each time an attack made by a CHARACTER, MONSTER or VEHICLE model targets the bearer’s unit, reduce the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
enhancements.flavorText: Wrought from the carapace of a nameless xenos monstrosity, this helm offers unparalleled protection.

detachments.name: Champions of Fenris
detachments.abilityDescription:
At the end of your opponent’s Charge phase, each ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY and ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER unit from your army that is within 3" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those units can declare a charge against one or more of those units, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. If that charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
While ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR units from your army are not Battle-shocked, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in those units.
RESTRICTIONS
Your army can include SPACE WOLVES units, but it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES units drawn from any other Chapter.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: The battle-brothers of this Great Company know what their lord expects of them and would rather die a thousand deaths than be found wanting in Grimnar’s eyes.

stratagems.name: PREYTAKER’S EYE
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] abilities. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have that ability.

stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: RUNES OF CLAIMING
stratagems.when: End of your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.name: CHILLING HOWL
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if that unit is Below Half-strength.

stratagems.name: STALKING WOLVES
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: s.TARGET: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

stratagems.name: ONRUSHING STORM
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Wolves’ Wisdom
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY model only. The bearer’s unit can declare a charge against one or more units within 6" instead of within 3" when using The Great Wolf Watches Detachment rule.
enhancements.flavorText: This champion has honed his killer instincts over endless years of bloody battle through wildly varying landscapes and against every manner of foe imaginable. He knows unerringly where and when to land the killing blow.

enhancements.name: Foes’ Fate
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR model only. Each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) within Engagement Range of the bearer’s unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take Desperate Escape tests. When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from each of those tests.
enhancements.flavorText: The skjalds tell in hushed voices how this warrior was born beneath a blood-omen moon, how his fate is interwoven with those of his prey-to-be and how he waits now at the end of each such enemy’s thread, the final and inescapable executor of their deaths.

enhancements.name: Fangrune Pendant
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR model only. The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
enhancements.flavorText: The fangs strung upon this adamantine thread belonged to the eldest and most cunning Fenrisian wolves. They are graven with runes of wisdom and guile, which are said to enhance the wearer’s own further.

enhancements.name: Longstrider
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. You can re-roll Charge rolls made for the bearer's unit.
enhancements.flavorText: This champion is renowned amongst their battle-brothers for their relentless pace when on the hunt, their loping strides eating up the miles as they run the foe to ground.

detachments.name: Saga of the Great Wolf
detachments.abilityDescription:
With Logan Grimnar commanding them, the hunting packs of the Space Wolves fight at peak efficiency.

At the start of your Command phase, you can select one of the Hunting Packs listed below. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Hunting Pack is active and its effects apply to all ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army. You can only select each Hunting Pack once per battle.

Encircling Jaws: This unit can re-roll Advance rolls and Charge rolls.
Hunter's Eye: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.
Ferocious Strike: Each time this unit is selected to fight, select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in this unit have the selected ability.

HOWLING ONSLAUGHT
Once per battle, when selecting a Hunting Pack for the Master of Wolves Detachment rule, if a LOGAN GRIMNAR model from your army is on the battlefield, you can select a Hunting Pack you have already selected this battle.

RESTRICTIONS
Your army can include SPACE WOLVES units, but it cannot include any ADEPTUS ASTARTES units drawn from any other Chapter.
detachments.abilityFlavorText: When the Great Wolf Logan Grimnar leads his packs to war, it is certain that mighty deeds will be done and epic verses added to the sagas of many a Space Wolf. There is none amongst the sons of Russ who can command such instinctive authority throughout his Chapter, none who so deftly wields warrior and war engine like a single great pack. In the sight of their lord, every Space Wolf aspires to be a champion of Fenris and strives with ever-greater determination to prove themselves worthy of his regard. Grimnar masterfully directs the hunt from its very heart, orchestrating every element like an apex predator herding its prey to destruction. Where restraint is needed, he sees it exercised. Where focused fury must be unleashed, he is its master and embodiment both. So does the saga of Logan Grimnar grow ever greater for the telling.

stratagems.name: THE FOE FORESEEN
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: GRIMNAR'S COMMAND
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one Hunting Pack from the Master of Wolves Detachment rule. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Hunting Pack is active for your unit instead of any other Hunting Pack that is active, even if you have already selected that Hunting Pack this battle.

stratagems.name: FENRISIAN FEROCITY
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move horizontally through models (excluding TITANIC models) and terrain features. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but cannot end a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within Engagement Range of them.

stratagems.name: UNRELENTING HUNTERS
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit is a SPACE WOLVES unit, until the end of the turn, it is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

stratagems.name: EYE OF THE PACK
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: BATTLE INSTINCTS
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
stratagems.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

enhancements.name: Grimnar's Mark
enhancements.description:
ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR CAPTAIN model only. Once per battle round, from the second battle round onwards, you can target the bearer's unit with the Rapid Ingress or Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this turn.

In the Declare Battle Formations step, the bearer can be attached to a WOLF GUARD TERMINATORS unit.
enhancements.flavorText: This moonsilver wolf-talisman is bestowed by the Great Wolf himself before battle, a mark of favour that fills the bearer with an eagerness to slay the foe.

enhancements.name: Howlmaw
enhancements.description: WOLF PRIEST model only. At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within 6" of the bearer. That unit must take a Battle-shock, subtracting 1 from the result.
enhancements.flavorText: An ancient hunting horn with a built-in vox amplification unit, this relic's stirring howl can be heard even through the wild clangour of battle.

enhancements.name: Chariots of the Storm
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. After both players have deployed their armies, select up to three ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.
enhancements.flavorText: This dedicated flight of gunships attends the Great Wolf and his packs, and can be called in to rapidly reposition his forces in the moments before battle is joined.

enhancements.name: Skjald's Foretelling
enhancements.description: WOLF GUARD BATTLE LEADER model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.
enhancements.flavorText: Great deeds have been prophesied for this champion, such that those who fight alongside him do so all the harder as they play out the self-fulfilling prophecy.
